channel.title: IntelliJ on Digital River
channel.description: Recent content in IntelliJ on Digital River

item.title: IntelliJ - serialVersionUID - enabling
item.description: If you are wondering why when you make a POJO bean to implement Serializable, IntelliJ does not throw any warnings to create the serialVersionUID variable… It’s because you need to enable it. Here’s how: <img src="/img/2011/02/intellij-enablingserialization.jpg" alt=""> Cheers!
